Uses of Interface
org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor.ColumnWriterIndex

Packages that use ColumnWriterIndex
Package
Description
org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor
Provides a light-weight, simplified set of column readers and writers that can be plugged into a variety of row-level readers and writers.
org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor.writer
Implementation of the vector writers.
org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor.writer.dummy
This package provides a "dummy" set of writers.

  • Uses of ColumnWriterIndex in org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor

    Methods in org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor that return ColumnWriterIndex
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ColumnWriterIndex
    ColumnWriterIndex.outerIndex()
    If this index represents a repeat level, return the index of the next higher repeat level.

    class 
    AbstractArrayWriter.ArrayElementWriterIndex
    Index into the vector of elements for a repeated vector.
    static final class 
    NullableScalarWriter.ChildIndex
     
    class 
    ScalarArrayWriter.ScalarElementWriterIndex
    For scalar arrays, incrementing the element index and committing the current value is done automatically since there is exactly one value per array element.
